days.title: Habit Inventory
days.prompt: List your daily habits, both positive and negative. Which habits align with your goals? Which ones work against you?

days.title: Resistance Points
days.prompt: What do you most often procrastinate on or avoid? What might this resistance be telling you about yourself?

days.title: Small Wins
days.prompt: Identify one small, specific action you can commit to doing every day this week. What will success look like?
